application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the ADE Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms/ studio bedspace below/above/adjoining kitchen/living/dining/bathroom of separate flat in pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission 241763FUL dated 23/09/2024 for: Conversion of a single family dwellinghouse into two self-contained residential units (following demolition of existing conservatory); alteration of existing outbuilding; installation of boundary fence to front and rear; provision of associated bin storage and bicycle spaces
